sections.PROJECTS:
Ltd are:

 Looking after breakdown maintenance daily and taking corrective actions to minimize down time 
of plant.

Managing work men according to the daily preventive maintenance schedule and attacking the 
daily problems online.

Planning and monitoring of shut down works to minimize plant down time.

Interacting with vendors to complete the necessary works and new installations in plant.

Contributing and taking initiation in Welding and Gas cutting works when on crisis situations.

Daily equipment checking according to check list.

Analyzing the break downs by discussing with department head 

Spare parts maintenance in advance in the heart core locations of the plant.
